Executive Family Home in preferred Ocean Park. When a designer creates the home of their dreams for their family something remarkable happens. This 7 bedroom, 4 bath COMPLETELY RENOVATED 4100 sqft home is sensational with no detail overlooked. The green lawn and west facing fenced yard are perfect for children or dogs to play
